FuncDef: The display gvrp statistics command displays GVRP information on a specific or all interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays GVRP information on a specific interface:
<ifType> specifies the type of the interface.<ifNum> specifies the number of the interface.
If interface <ifType> <ifNum> is not specified in the command, GVRP information on all interfaces is displayed.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check GVRP information on a specific or all interfaces, run the display gvrp statistics command. The information includes GVRP status, number of GVRP registration failures, source MAC address of the last GVRP PDU, and GVRP registration mode on an interface.
